front.title: Use of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellamn Key Agreement Algorithm with curve25519 and curve448 in the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS)

abstract.t: This document describes the conventions for using Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellamn (ECDH) key agreement algorithm using curve25519 and curve448 in the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS).
